column4: Can Ubuntu run a graphical interface without a graphics card? I only have an intergrated chip on the motherboard.
How do I install Ubuntu from windows...the application started with a w...what is it called?
Does Wubi install Ubuntu on a seperate partition?
wubi installs ubuntu in a folder, that folder could be on a different partition if you wanted it set that way, main disadvantage:  your folder is now susceptible to windows virii and other threats
